languages.text: {n}Взгляд Кибеллы, упирающийся в вас, прожигает словно мельта.{/n} "Домин'{name}... нельзя делить душу со многими. Сделай выбор".

traits.locale_text: {n}Взгляд Кибеллы, упирающийся в вас, прожигает словно мельта.{/n} "Эним'{name}... нельзя делить свою душу со многими. Скажи свое слово. Сделай выбор".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд Кибеллы, упирающийся в вас, прожигает словно мельта.{/n} "Домин'{name}... нельзя делить душу со многими. Сделай выбор".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Enim'{name}... One cannot share their soul with many. A choice demands to be made."
{n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Enim'{name}... One cannot share their soul with many. A choice demands to be made."
{n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Enim'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."
{n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Enim'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."
{n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."
{n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Blick scheint dich zu durchbohren.{/n} "Domin'{name}... man kann seine Seele nicht mit vielen teilen. Man muss eine Entscheidung treffen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Blick scheint dich zu durchbohren.{/n} "Domin'{name}... man kann seine Seele nicht mit vielen teilen. Man muss eine Entscheidung treffen."

languages.text: {n}La mirada de Kibellah te atraviesa el alma.{/n} «Domin'{name}... un{mf|o|a} no puede compartir su alma con varias personas. Debe tomar una decisión».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada de Kibellah te atraviesa el alma.{/n} «Domin'{name}... un{mf|o|a} no puede compartir su alma con varias personas. Debe tomar una decisión».

languages.text: {n}キベラの視線は、あなたを焼き尽くしそうに思えた。{/n}「ドミン・{name}…多くの人と魂を分かち合うことはできません。必ず選ばなければならないのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの視線は、あなたを焼き尽くしそうに思えた。{/n}「ドミン・{name}…多くの人と魂を分かち合うことはできません。必ず選ばなければならないのです」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈的凝视仿佛要洞穿你的灵魂一样。{/n}“秘者{name}……人不能与许多人分享自己的灵魂，必须做出选择。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈的凝视仿佛要洞穿你的灵魂一样。{/n}“秘者{name}……人不能与许多人分享自己的灵魂，必须做出选择。”

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Kibellah est si ardent qu'il menacerait presque de vous transpercer de ses feux.{/n} « Domin'{name}... nul ne peut partager son âme avec plusieurs personnes. Il vous faut faire un choix. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Kibellah est si ardent qu'il menacerait presque de vous transpercer de ses feux.{/n} « Domin'{name}... nul ne peut partager son âme avec plusieurs personnes. Il vous faut faire un choix. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın bakışları, alev alev yakarak seni delip geçebilecekmiş gibi geliyor.{/n} "Domin'{name}... Kişi ruhunu niceleriyle paylaşamaz. Bir seçim yapılması gerekir."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's stare feels like it could burn right through you.{/n} "Domin'{name}... one cannot share their soul with many. A choice must be made."
